DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study of Lumigan® 0.01% (bimatoprost) treatment in clinical practice for patients with Primary Open Angle Glaucoma (POAG) or Ocular Hypertension (OHT).
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Lumigan® in Patients With Primary Open Angle Glaucoma (POAG) or Ocular Hypertension (OHT)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with primary open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension Prescribed Lumigan®
